title: The Costume Killer
description: Florida is the new home of a notorious serial killer with a bizarre MO. All his victims are found dressed up in various uniforms, and all are connected in a mysterious way. He might appear immature and gullible, but he is a master manipulator. Will he succeed in his vigilante ways and fuel his ego? Or will his rising paranoia and quest for dominance lead to his downfall?
author: L. Moore
